pages.title: Ritual Circle
pages.text: In order to craft your own $(spells), you will need to build a $(ritual_circle) in your world.$(br)Build the structure from the opposite page in the world, then you can follow the instructions from the $(l:ritual/crafting_spells)$(bold)$(italic)'Crafting Spells'$() entry on how to craft the spell you want!

pages.name: Ritual Circle
pages.text: This is how to build a $(ritual_circle). Just light up the candles to get it ready to use!
